name: get_place
description: Extract name of place and theme or activity for the trip in the given texts and check if it is located in Hokkaido, Japan.

place.description: The name of the actual geographical location for the trip. This should be a recognized place name such as a town, city, region, country, or state. Abstract or generic locations like 'countryside' are not accepted.

itinerary.description: The theme or activity that the user is interested

isLocationValid.description: Flag that tells whether the place is located in Hokkaido or not.
